575:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kiṃ punarbhagavan prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
575:5: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlānāmupacayo bhavati?
575:6: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalato'rciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā,
575:9: na hi bhagavan arciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā|
575:10: na ca prathamābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā|
575:11: na ca bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣā sā vartirdagdhā,
575:12: na ca paścimābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā|
575:13: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sā vartirdagdhā?
575:16: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte na ca prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
575:23: na ca nāma bhagavan prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
575:24: na ca nāma prathamacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate|
575:25: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
575:26: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
575:27: na ca nāma taiścittotpādairna cānyatra tebhyaścittotpādebhyo'bhisaṃbudhyate|
575:29: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittaṃ niruddham,
575:47: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvaniruddha eva,
575:50: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā nirotsyate?
575:52: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā?
575:54: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā,
575:67: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre carati?
575:71: tathā hyasya te samudācārā na pravartante,
575:73: bhagavānāha-yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati,
575:76: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramārthe carati,
575:79: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tasya nimittamavibhāvitam?
575:81: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavati?
575:82: subhūtirāha-na sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prayujyate-kathamahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ carannihaiva nimittaprahāṇamanuprāpnuyāmiti|
575:88: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatastrīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati-śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca,
575:93: avikalpo hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaśca divasaścokto bhagavatā|
575:94: sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitālābhī divase divase prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
575:95: tato'sya prajñāpāramitābhyāsataḥ svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāvaipulyena bhavitavyam|
575:96: śāriputra āha-yatpunarayuṣman subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā svapnāntaragataḥ karma śubhamaśubhaṃ vā karoti,
575:97: kiṃ bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā?
575:99: tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā|
575:100: atha punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati,
575:101: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā|
575:102: kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati?
575:103: sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ vikalpayati-aho hataḥ,
575:108: śāriputra āha-sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati-aho hataḥ,
575:112: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā?
575:114: tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet?
575:118: tadyathāpi nāma ākāśameva āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate,
575:127: tasmāttarhi āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā,
575:129: śāriputra āha-yadāyuṣman subhūte sarvārambaṇāni viviktāni ākhyātāni bhagavatā,
575:130: tadā kasmādāyuṣman subhūte sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā?
575:131: subhūtirāha-nimittīkṛtya āyuṣman śāriputra vidyamānamevārambaṇamārambaṇīkṛtya sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate,
575:140: śāriputra āha-yadāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāt,
575:143: subhūtirāha-ayamāyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ|
575:148: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-ayamāyuṣman maitreya subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha-mayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ|
575:151: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yadāyuṣmān subhūtirevamāha-ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ|
575:153: kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yadetannāmadheyaṃ maitreya iti?
575:165: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte rūpasya śūnyatā,
575:168: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte vijñānasya śūnyatā,
575:178: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-kaccitpunarāyuṣman maitreya tvayā ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
575:180: maitreya āha-na mayā āyuṣman śāriputra ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
575:187: api tu khalu punarāyuṣman śāriputra na kāyena spṛśyeta,
575:191: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt-gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
575:192: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritāvī nirdiśati||
575:193: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma-kutaste śāriputra etadabhūt-gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti?
575:194: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra taṃ dharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa samanvāgato'rhanniti prabhāvyate?
575:196: bhagavānāha-evameva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati-ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
575:207: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
575:211: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṃ parityaktavyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya|
575:217: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra me buddhakṣetre na bhaviṣyanti,
575:220: punaraparaṃ śāriputra corakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
575:225: utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktasarvapariṣkāropakaraṇena|
575:230: teṣāmapi ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na manasā aparāddhavyam|
575:231: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati|
575:235: yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataścorakāntārāṇyapi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
575:238: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
575:240: punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam|
575:243: evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam-sarvasattvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam|
575:249: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike mahākaruṇācittamutpādayitavyam-aho bata alpapuṇyā amī sattvāḥ,
575:253: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti,
575:257: tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
575:258: yathā vīryapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti||
575:259: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam|
575:260: evaṃ cānena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ-tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye,
575:262: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
575:264: sukhitā eva te sattvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ|
575:266: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati,
575:268: tattadeva prādurbhaviṣyati tadyathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasaiva sarvamutpadyate,
575:269: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ manasaiva sarvaṃ prādurbhaviṣyati,
575:272: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti,
575:273: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarvathā sarvataḥ sarvadā,
575:274: tathā ca svacittapariśuddhaye vyāyaṃsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
575:275: yathā dhyānapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti||
575:276: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyādhikāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam|
575:277: evaṃ cānenopaparīkṣitavyaṃ cintayitavyaṃ tulayitavyam-neha sa kaściddharmo yo vyādhyā bādhyate,
575:280: na cotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam|
575:281: na ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam|
575:285: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena [na] duṣkarasaṃjñotpādayitavyā-bahvī dīrghā caiṣā apūrvā koṭiriti,
575:287: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam|
575:288: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhyaścānyebhyaśca dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
575:289: jñātavyamidaṃ śāriputra bhavyo'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhumiti|
575:290: evaṃ ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ-tathā kariṣyāmi,
575:292: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarvasattvānāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvavyādhayo na bhaviṣyanti,
575:296: tathā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parijayaṃ kariṣyāmi sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
575:297: yathā prajñāpāramitāpi me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti||
575:298: atha khalu tatra parṣadi anyatarā strī saṃnipatitā saṃniṣaṇṇābhūt|
575:299: sā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-ahaṃ bhagavan atra sthāne notrasiṣyāmi,
575:302: anutrastā ca asaṃtrastā ca sarvasattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti|
575:303: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ suvarṇavarṇasmitaṃ prādurakarot|
575:304: tadanantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā spharitvā yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata eva mūrdhni antaradhīyata|
575:305: samanantaraṃ prāduṣkṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin smite atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavākiradabhiprākirat|
575:306: atha khalu tāni suvarṇapuṣpāṇyasaktāni antarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitānyabhūvan||
575:307: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
575:309: nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti|
575:310: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-iyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca|
575:313: seyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivartya puruṣabhāvaṃ pratilabhya itaścyutvā akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate|
575:314: tatra copapannā akṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati|
575:315: tataścyutā satī buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati avirahitā tathāgatadarśanena|
575:318: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda rājā cakravartīṃ prāsādātprāsādaṃ saṃkrāmet,
575:320: sa yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyāṃ bhūmitalaṃ pabhdyāmanākramya kālaṃ kuryāt,
575:321: evameva ānanda iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginī buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati|
575:322: tatra ca avirahitā bhaviṣyati buddharbhagavadbhiryāvannānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate||
575:323: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhūt-ye tatrākṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
575:325: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmata ānandasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-evametadānanda, evametat|
575:327: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti|
575:329: tasya khalu punarānanda suvarṇapuṣpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na pramāṇabaddhaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati|
575:331: tāvanto hyānanda tatra śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ nāsti pramāṇam|
575:332: api tvaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā ityevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gamiṣyanti|
575:333: tena khalu punarānanda kālena tena samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre na vyālakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti,
575:334: na caurakāntārāṇi na pānīyakāntārāṇi na vyādhikāntārāṇi na durbhikṣakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti|
575:335: etāni cānyāni ca ānanda asātakāntārāṇi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
575:337: suvarṇapuṣpasya khalu punarānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya imānyevaṃrūpāṇi bhayabhairavakāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ tadānīṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
575:339: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat-anayā bhagavan gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā katamasya tathāgatasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
575:340: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-anayā ānanda gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitam,
575:342: sa ca dīpaṃkarastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpairevāvakīrṇo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā|
575:344: anutpattikeṣu ca mayā dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
575:345: tato'haṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau-bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavaka anāgate'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti|
575:346: tadā etasyā bhaginyā mama vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittamudapādi-aho bata ahamapyevaṃ vyākriyeya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
575:347: evaṃ ca ānanda etasyā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamabhūdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
575:348: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat-kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ bhagavan kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
575:350: evametat yathā vadasi-kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti||
